after the death of daria dugina the daughter of russian ideologue expert be convince that russian propaganda will use the mysterious event to fuel anti ukrainian sentiment and interest in the war in ukraine in the other hand the kremlin will not be interested in mythologize alexander dugin and his ultranationalist view the continuation of the internal game of the service in the kremlin await we first they will take advantage of the attack and then they will pass over it on the agenda expert tell we recall that on saturday evening in car explosion on the highway near moscow daria dugina the daughter of alexander dugin one of the kremlin's main ideologue supporter of russian imperialism and the invasion of ukraine die in car explosion dugin be suppose to drive the car but at the last moment he switch to another vehicle accord to the russian security service fsb the attack be organize and carry out by citizen of ukraine however it soon turn out that the evidence of her guilt have be fabricate and the ukrainian authority firmly distance themselves from the incident at the same time accord to the independent portal meduza interest in the war be decline in russia russians not start to get tired of topic relate to the special operation in ukraine accord to the portal this be also confirm by the result of research conduct by the private hold company romir these show that the viewership of the most important federal channel have fall by at least eight percent most of the airtime on russian television be now occupy by political talk show in which the host and participant talk about ukraine and hostile country of the west the analysis read kremlin will stimulate society will russian propaganda use the assassination of the daughter of russian ideologue to renew interest in war will it build the myth of dugin on the basis of mysterious event accord to expert interview by wirtualna polska due to internal power struggle in the kremlin the topic about the attack will be short live it seem that the russian society be really start to get tired of information about the war in ukraine the russians be no long react to the event at the front to the same extent as at the beginning of the conflict michał marek an expert on disinformation in russia president of the center for research on the contemporary security environment foundation tell wirtualna polska as he emphasize that be why any event that can stimulate emotion in connection with the war be beneficial from the kremlin's perspective the murder of daria dugina will probably play such role now but in the long term also in the mythical perspective the issue of the assassination will not affect the mood of the russians they will move on to everyday matter and the subject will be forget he add and as he emphasize russian propaganda center use the attack for one purpose to fuel anti ukrainian and anti western sentiment the lead narrative be blame ukraine but there be also the theme of the responsibility of the western service like mantra the slogan that this be war between russia and nato be repeat thus the kremlin build continuous support for further action in ukraine assess michał marek professor daniel bockowski from the department of international security at the university of bialystok speak in similar tone after the coup the kremlin can stimulate the public to become interested in the war again russian propagandist be good at this but they be also painfully predictable although dugin be pro kremlin ideologue it be his daughter who be more popular in russia she appear very often in propaganda material incite hatred towards the west and ukraine she be identify with the system the kremlin may want to take advantage of this prof daniel bockowski dugin be not guru in russia in his opinion the attack on dugina do not resonate much in russia itself maybe only among ultranationalist who call for retaliation in ukraine the kremlin will not mythologize dugin's daughter because dugin himself would become mythical she be reflection of his ideology ultranationalism be good in russia for extremely pro war politician and businessman who profit from the conflict but it do not have to be in the interest of oligarch who have lose their fortune yacht and the ability to travel around the world assess prof daniel bockowski as professor mark galeotti an author of book on russia write in commentary for the spectator weekly although many in the west consider dugin to be putin's brain or putin's rasputin he be not and have never be particularly influential and have no personal tie to the russian president in the opinion of the scientist dugin be one of whole series of political entrepreneur who be try to present their plan and doctrine to the kremlin for while in 2014 he be on roll because his claim about the civilizational destiny of russia and the status of eurasian nation be convenient when rationalize the seizure of land in the donbass later however dugin cease to be useful say markgaleotti an ideologue convenient for the kremlin accord to prof daniel bockowski dugin function in the russian political system thank to the fact that he be pay by the kremlin the system pay for dugin the authority use he as tool his concept vision of the world view be sometimes less need sometimes more more so it float to the top if less he circulate in the environment of his ultranationalist and no one bother he and his daughter shine with reflect light have no idea what to do sign her philosophical analyze with the pseudonym daria platonova say wp prof daniel bockowski in the opinion of our interlocutor internal struggle in russia be behind the attack certainly no russian national army or ukrainian service but putin do not decide that either we must stop ideologize the russian dictator for the last 10 year we have have propaganda project in russia that putin be all powerful but it be not it do not decide everything putin be not god even if he want to he be not even stalin it be part of the puzzle we do not know if he make it himself or if other make it remember that war be business in the conflict some group in russia make business and other lose out here would be more interested in unravel the mystery of the assassination attempt believe prof daniel bockowski in turn michał marek from the foundation center for research on the contemporary security environment predict that similar attack like the one on dugina may continue but not right away the current event will be silence and later we may witness more similar outbreak the assassination attempt on dugina could well have be the responsibility of the secret service as well as kremlin faction in the case of the murder of the russian ideologue's daughter the matter be very unclear however one inaccuracy should be note initially it be report that burn body be find in the car the photograph and recording show that dugina's body be outside the car throw onto the road we can therefore assume that there be someone else in the car which the russian side do not inform so the question be be it dugina who be the real target of the bomber wonder michał marekputin will take advantage of dugina's death kremlin can stimulate its society

it do not really matter if we consider the right to abortion to be fundamental right or not it be important that the prohibition or restriction of this right may constitute violation of woman's right work for some time like the registry of the european court of human right have handle three polish case assign to by lot concern the relationship between the act of 1993 on family planning protection of the human fetus and the condition for the admissibility of abortion and the european convention for the protection of human right and fundamental freedom which have be part of the polish legal order since 1993 there be three case complaint by alicja tysiac complaint by and the complaint of and all result in judgment in which the tribunal rule that the polish authority have violate the european convention for the protection of human right and fundamental freedom in relation to the woman complainant the right to respect for private life be violate and in the case of also the prohibition of inhuman treatment for the purpose of these case have cut my professional tooth on study the consequence of ban or restrict access to legal abortion for human right in the dimension of national organization in the perspective of comparative law and international law that be why it be with some irritation that read some legal enunciation about abortion today because of the carelessness of the author the superficiality of their text or the hard ideologization of the subject resistant to the rule of the legal craft and often also to fact an example from the last few day an interview with my talented colleague attorney tomasz snarski publish by the catholic information agency understand that kai need expert legitimacy for the content it publish on the legal aspect of abortion however have serious problem with what attorney snarski say as an expert woman's human right by employ the trick of glamorously state as fact that abortion be not human right he manage to overlook or distract the reader from that the legal permissibility of abortion shape and impact the human right of which the woman be the subject we read in the interview that when it come to ensure the protection of the state for woman who may find themselves in situation of have to terminate pregnancy there be no need to refer to human right we will not find in snarski's word information about the relationship between the way in which the law determine the admissibility of abortion and the human right of woman as if this relationship do not exist and the right to abortion be as snarski say gracious exception or concession of the legislator by the way present the right to abortion in this way be unbeara ##bly cheesy and from comparative legal perspective inaccurate for example in canada after the 1988 supreme court repeal of law criminalize abortion on the ground of its unconstitutional character no legislation be enact at the federal or in individual province which define the condition for the admissibility of abortion the issue be not whether legal abortion be human right or not the point be that the fundamental right to respect for woman's private life apply to assess how the law regulate access to legal abortion as well as to other medical service in the field of reproductive health this right be guarantee to every person by art 47 of the constitution article of the european convention for the protection of human right and fundamental freedom in force in poland or art of the european charter of fundamental right that will mention only the most important act of national or international law it should also not be forget that respect for private life and protection against state interference have be part of the european and anglo saxon legal tradition for century therefore tomasz snarski or the journalist interview he make his task easier it do not attempt to answer the question of what be the relationship between the respect for woman's private life guarantee by law and the compete right that the fetus might be entitle to in 2018 the then ombudsman adam bodnar say in the context of parliamentary work on two civic project which in the intention of the author be to change the law on the condition for admissibility of abortion that abortion be not human right the point be however that these condition be determine by the national legislator as international law do not directly guarantee the right to abortion not that the issue of abortion be indifferent to woman's human right as attorney snarski now claim we know that such relationship exist for example from the judgment of the european court of human right he note long ago that abortion legislation touch on the private sphere because whenever woman be pregnant her private lifee becomes closely relate to the develop fetus article of the european convention on human right guarantee the right to respect for private life can not in the court's view be interpret as confer the right to abortion but the factual situation result from the existence of prohibition or restriction on access be subject to assessment as to whether woman's right to respect for her private life have not be infringe as result of these prohibition thus it be of no great importance whether we consider the right to abortion to be fundamental right or not it be important that the prohibition or restriction of this right may constitute violation of woman's right we will not find this information in the kai interview the principle of proportionality have not be adopt in poland yes there be mention of weigh certain value meanwhile we be deal with classic and often encounter in the practice of make and apply the law situation of competition worthy of protection of good value right the law have long know the mean of settle such conflict under polish law such an instrument be art 31 section of the constitution it provide that restriction on the exercise of constitutional freedom and the end of military operation against ukraine will not mean the continuation of the conflict with russia the historian feliks koneczny describe the rivalry of various civilizational principle in eastern europe this unique analysis from few decade ago can still help to understand the ideological motive behind the russian invasion as well as provide inspiration for the development of post war model of development for ukraine with the history window wide open would like to bring the reader close to koneczny's perspective will present the element of reform that could consolidate ukraine's turn towards the west the establishment of new relation with russia by the eu and the anglo saxon country as well as the phase of reconstruction of ukraine which be still far away will cover complex of dimension political military and economic in the commentary will focus on reference to cultural and religious specificity which be brilliantly read by prof necessary for eastern europe the polish public debate on post war relation between kyiv and warsaw for example marek budzisz's emotionally arouse article about the possibility of federation of the two state in the future focus on the rhetoric of the balance of power in europe which be determine by military territorial and economic resource in my opinion the discussion be complement by the civilizational and cultural foundation as prove by prof necessary they be of great importance will try to argue give the theoretical analysis in four short part that last peace in eastern europe would be contribute to by the mental and cultural change that last for year the strategy of introduce civilizational reform could also be the basis for post war cooperation between ukraine and poland koneczny's legacy historian from krakow over several dozen year of work he create an original comparative science of civilization an important step towards which be his habilitation in the history of eastern europe in 1920 the contribution of the polish academic lecturer differ from the vision of samuel huntington or how russian thinker themselves see their eurasian or pan slavic civilizational role jabłonski 2014 koneczny define civilization as method of organize social life it include ethical principle legal system separation of socio economic relation civilization affect the content and depth of culture on the other hand the form of culture architectural style folklore cuisine or the alphabet use do not predominate about civilization affiliation the scholar point to the rivalry of several civilization in europe primarily the turanian byzantine and latin he popularize the greatness and ethical primacy of the latter western european which draw on greek philosophy roman law and christian ethic be accord to koneczny long term fruit of the activity of the catholic church various civilizational influence in russian mir prof koneczny describe the dominant method of organize social life in russia as the turanian civilization the name come from the persian word turan which be use to describe the region of central asia the great steppe the main feature of the archetype of the turanian civilization include militarism of social organization and statehood base on private law which can be understand that public institution and in principle also society be treat as kind of property of an absolute ruler khan or tsar koneczny's observation help to explain for example the practice of russia's foreign policy the aim of which in opposition to western country do not have to be the national interest the historian argue that compete ideological influence have clash on the volga river for century the russian empire however remain an alien civilizational pole to the west his skeleton turn out to be more durable than the ideology of communism the scientist from krakow consistently emphasize that there be civilizational difference between ruthenian and ruthenians kievan rus the cossack hetmanate or contemporary ukraine be example where mentality different from the russian one and thus method of organize social life be emphasize the decisive and extremely united reaction of ukrainian to the neighbor's aggression in 2022 show that the concept of the russian mir de facto imperial doctrine disregard the harsh civilizational reality of the region the importance of the moral and religious dimension for the future of ukraine eastern society be be reborn in general only through religion conclude researcher of the history of this part of europe koneczny 275 the scientist notice that eastern society have never recover from moral decline other than by first reform their religious organization in ukraine tectonic change be take place in the structure of orthodoxy although it be still difficult to predict what doctrinal and social consequence they will bring until recently there be division into three orthodox church include one pro moscow to which most christian in the country belong in the breakthrough year 2019u two church institution merge to form the united orthodox church of ukraine pku the situation during the war accelerate dramatically hundred of community parish and thousand of faithful leave the structure recognize the supremacy of the moscow patriarchate and join pku the process be complex gorny 2022 and also encounter resistance from clergy faithful to moscow as well as agent of the kremlin's influence the clergy in ukraine along with break tie with moscow should be give great autonomy from the secular authority such autonomy be characteristic of the latin civilization and impossible in the turanian the phenomenon can be attribute to the justification in revelation the clergy must above all be faithful to god's law could poland contribute in line with koneczny's guideline to support moral and religious change in our neighbor it seem that the arrival of million of refugee to our country have already capture the heart of ukrainian and prompt deep reflection on the source of this phenomenon outside the area of latin civilization it be hard to witness such scale of solidarity of ordinary people include parish poland have advantage that it could offer its neighbor when it come to christian ethic and this despite the crisis of faith and value that be also swell in our country will focus on the example of protect the conceived life this dimension if only because of the demographic ukraine's population decrease by several million after the collapse of the ussr or the psychological consequence for mother and father the so call post abortion syndrome should be of fundamental importance for the ukrainian elite change in polish legislation to protect the unborn life and the organic pro life movement in our country the strong in europe can be genuine role model for ukrainian and the local clergy although maintain the admissibility of abortion in the case of rape in polish regulation take its revenge during the turmoil of war the adopt volume of the article allow the reader to be interested in how religion and ethic fundamentally affect civilization further thought prof dr ewa kurek or robert tekiela see the attach item in the bibliography for those interested show that the peculiar perception of god and theological issue in russian orthodoxy contribute to the consolidation of the herd mentality as koneczny call it as oppose to catholic personalism europeanization of russia through ukraine in this part of the commentary would like to briefly discuss the thesis support it with quote from koneczny's history of russia that kievan rus have special civilizational impact on the russian empire ukraine on the other hand remain sensitive to polish and western idea the thesis of an ideological intermediary to europeanize russia seem fundamentally important to consider there be many indication that an even great challenge than favorable or at least acceptable military resolution of the war for ukrainian society will be the issue of defend peace after its end if ukraine despite the great difficulty of its location develop an attractive civilizational model in the reconstruction phase the kremlin elite will watch with great attention the action of kiev the mother of all russian city this be due to the fact that the power of strong also imperial autocrat be civilizational method that can be effective with large own resource however it do not work in itself when russia need to find way to renew morality improve demographic and solve the material problem of ordinary families. of koneczny note that on various occasion the russians have considerable difficulty in understand foreign think western european concept derive without the mediation of southern ruthenia or even poland be dizzying and cause disorganization koneczny 249 at present in time of great cultural crisis in the transatlantic world explain the advantage offer by the principle of the rotten west be particular challenge it seem that the ukrainian elite should be the predestined translator to show what good flow from the foundation of the latin civilization the cultural revival in the turanian civilization could only effectively come from the same source from which it spring up in the past from southern ruthenia direct polish influence be exclude for religious reason and the cultural gulf be too great anyway koneczny 151 of course the social situation to which koneczny refer when analyze relation in the mid seventeenth century will be significantly different from the present one the secularize russia of the 21st century boasting about the legacy of the ussr try to despise the ukrainian treat their culture as inferior however the key to the europeanization of the russian soul should still be seek which be inevitably associate with deny the false narrative which be expose for example by the fact on the front and the heroic attitude of ukrainian soldiersy work in the field of history religion and ethic develop ukrainian culture which should also be support among refugee be important here in the long term the need for organizational and intellectual effort as result of the military invasion there be an unprecedented potential for civilizational change in ukraine kyiv have show that it have autosteere elite early one be exterminate among other as result of communist purge whose behavior command respect in most of the world's salon there be also an accelerated retreat from russian culture on the dnieper create an ideological vacuum great expectation energy and spirit of sacrifice be ignite in the ideologically cement ukrainian nation there be favorable atmosphere for broad talk about the post war period because the government and institution of our country have become aware of certain unity in the dimension of the security architecture of the region ukraine have be grant candidate status for eu membership and integration process should also be consider in broad european context if the ukrainian elite agree that the adoption of element of latin civilization serve the good of their nation and these principle enter into strategic thinking it will be much more durable basis for cooperation in the area of the so call intermarium than democratically change politician or beautiful gesture of decision maker such as the decision of the mayor of lviv to unveil stone lion at the eaglet cemetery poland could get involve in promote the understanding of koneczny's civilization abroad draw on the talent of our great historian for which special team could be appoint foreign activity should be precede by contact with ukrainian listen openly to their voice on many issue as well as to the thought of scientist who constructively polemicize with koneczny fortunately the historian's work have already be translate into english but the challenge remain to reach the public with his message in anglo saxon country and the european union include the three sea initiative this would allow the international public to see the possible element of build peace in our part of the continent the promotion of koneczny's scientific achievement postulate in the commentary as well as be inspire by it during discussion on the post war model of ukraine's development seem to be very big task also call for attempt at internal reform in our country if pole be to be authentic preacher of these idea however the external situation the specter of world war iii may be conducive to the decision maker of the west not interfere with the ideological shaping of the intermarium order by the people of the region there be no certainty here consider the emerge difference of interest and the strong influence of various ideology on politician but there be providential chance would like to leave the reader with question can poland desert its dusty civilizing mission in the east believe that failure to make effort to europeanize russia be not only pusillanimity but also great risk as many expert argue the russian federation will push for another even big conflict in few year see poland as the keystone of the balance of power in the region the latinization of ukraine refer to koneczny guideline may be key stage in ensure civilizational peace in our part of the continent which will radiate far to the east would like to end my comment by refer to religious perspective john paul ii understand it well and be able to draw conclusion from it during the cold war christian strengthen by the act of consecration of russia and ukraine to the immaculate heart of mary make in march should remain in unshakable hope that they be not alone in the fight for good and truthjan wudkowski poland inspire civilization element of reform for ukraine

south africa be experience severe electricity crisis and resident be be cut off from electricity the situation repeat itself cyclically but the problem be get big and big the state own operator have be underinveste since the dismantling of apartheid and eskom under the new management have not direct its profit either to investment or even to proper maintenance of the network now as in 2019 power outage be multiply across the country several time day plus it be winter there each time the shutdown last for several hour public company eskom even warn that south african must prepare for at least 100 day of power outage in the come month south africa's energy sector be 80 dependent on coal of which there be no shortage however most power plant be age decapitalise and have not be modernize due to endemic corruption the state own company have become haven and source of funding for progressive policies they be especially visible during the presidency of jacob zuma in 2009 2018 in addition the state own company be heavily indebte all costs mean that today it be unable to meet the country's electricity need it also do not help that south africa's energy sector have recently experience major strike by worker demand wage increase and housing subsidy the south african government recently get 7. 7 billion in aid at the recent cop 26 in glasgow for the energy transition there be suppose to be megawatt of wind and solar energy accord to the government's plan adopt in 2015 seven year later these new energy source be go meanwhile electricity demand in south africa could triple by 2040 socialism combine with africanization always produce the same resultin south africa the light have already be turn off

the idea of compensate eastern european country for soviet make tank transfer to ukraine with modern german equipment do not work out and lead to sharp dispute with poland the german daily sueddeutsche zeitung return on monday july 25 2022 to the dispute between germany and poland over the exchange of military equipment the so call ringtausch in exchange for soviet make 72 tank hand over to ukraine after the outbreak of war poland and other eastern european country be to receive modern equipment from germany the proposal put forward at the end of april enjoy the support of both the german government and the opposition give hope for quick help for ukraine recall mike szymanski thank to this the ukrainian armed force have weapon that they know well and do not have to waste time on train the german government promise to compensate partner for equipment loss so much for theory the practice look completely different in july apart from declaration of intention and numerous problem the equipment exchange system do not bring much new there be even sharp dispute with poland write the author german proposal too little too late szymanski ask that poland give ukraine more than 200 soviet make tank the german side offer poland 20 old tank model leopard 2a4 accord to the polish ministry of defence german tank would only be operational in 12 month too little too late say the head of the ministry of defense mariusz błaszczak in his opinion poland need 44 tank deputy minister of foreign affairs szymon szynkowski vel sek even speak of deliberately mislead the polish side there be also dissatisfaction in slovenia initially germany plan to reinforce the slovenian army with marder and fuchs armored vehicle withdraw from the bundeswehr but the slovene consider this equipment obsolete slovenia demand more modern boxer combat vehicle leopard tank with puma armored personnel carrier there be no progress in the negotiation emphasize sz talk be also underway with the greek authority but also in this case there be no result yet why be conversation so hard szymanski wonder in his opinion the bundeswehr itself need modern equipment at the end of the cold war germany have over 2, 000 leopard tank currently the bundeswehr have only 225 machine it be only after the annexation of crimea in 2014 that berlin begin to modernize the equipment arm factory have now start hand over new model of leopard gradually will the bundeswehr run out of tank every tank that be currently be hand over to other country may soon be miss from the bundeswehr szymanski explain the construction of tank take several year one of the reason be the shortage of part include cannon barrel defense minister christine lambrecht promise that she would not allow the bundeswehr to be far weaken accord to the author support for the replacement of equipment be dwindle in the government coalition it be not work say the chair of the parliamentary defense committee marie agnes strack zimmermann fdp doubt if this be the right way although in individual case an agreement seem possible add the fdp mpanger against germany be rise in poland too little too late

this mean that ukrainian have more than enough reason to fear for their own future budapest memorandum today no one remember or rather do not want to remember that for moment ukraine be nuclear power 2. 5 thousand asset in its hand tactical missile with nuclear warhead only the united states and russia have more at that time both of these country together with west germany france and great britain immediately begin to put pressure on kyiv to transfer the entire arsenal to russia this be do discreetly because there be no reason for independent ukraine to give back what it legally inherit from the ussr the pressure from the superpower bear fruit and in december 1994 during the budapest summit of the organization for security and cooperation in europe osce president leonid kravchuk announce ukraine's renunciation of its ambition to remain nuclear power the entire west applaud he for hand over the missile and nuclear warhead to russia washington then promise economic support and moscow promise cheap fuel and electricity to the so call the budap memorandum include security guarantee in exchange for give up nuclear weapon the kremlin and the wind power promise in write among other thing protection of ukraine's independence and the inviolability of exist border crimea and the war in donbass twenty year have pass and the ukrainian dream to leave russia's sphere of influence because they want like poland and other central european country to join the wealthy west the overthrow of president viktor yanukovych and the new government's desire to join nato and the european union put vladimir putin's imperial plan in jeopardy unable to subjugate all of ukraine with one stroke the russian president annex crimea and start war in the donbass the west respond with moderately onerous sanction two decade after the signing of the budapest memorandum russia grab large part of ukraine's territory and cut off cheap fuel supply while the other signatory of the document do not fulfill the guarantee give to kiev in this way the ukrainian find out the hard way that there be difference between whether you have piece of paper sign by representative of the superpower or your own nuclear warhead the economically weak practically disarm country during yanukovych's presidency spending on the army be reduce to symbolic amount have one trump card it be network of gas pipeline that transport gas from russia to western europe germany be and be its main recipient full scale war in 2014 threaten to damage the transmission grid or in desperation the ukrainian themselves would block it at that time around 55 billion m3 of gas be pump annually through the nord stream gas pipeline along the bottom of the baltic sea the maximum transmission capacity of the yamal europe gas pipeline run through belarus and poland be 33 billion m3 approximately 65 billion m3 of gas flow to the west via gas pipeline through ukraine it be easy to see that the russian army's march on kyiv could have cost moscow sudden loss of up to 50 percent of its gdp revenue from the export of blue fuel plus even tough sanction from the west and bad of all western recipient lead by germany would be encourage to look for other supplier the rapid expansion of gas terminal would open the eu to liquefy gas supply from the us and the middle east new pipeline from norwegian and british deposit would also be an option the risk be no long calculate thus the kremlin even give up the fight to carve out another area from ukraine connect crimea directly with russia although it be necessity because currently the peninsula have be cut off from the key water source and the only thing that connect it with the rest of the russian state be the crimean bridge over the kerch strait energiewende merkel's beloved child the network of gas pipeline run through ukraine largely save the country defenseless in 2014 from vladimir putin go few step far at the same time she motivate angela merkel to take very decisive action the sudden reduction in russian gas supply put her beloved child the energiewende in jeopardy throughout her rule the german chancellor consistently implement the great energy transformation of the country germany promote renewable energy source while phase out power plant first hard coal fire then nuclear and finally lignite fire however the power loss in the network must be successively supplement by new gas fire power plant and fuel from russia be the cheap and easy to deliver for germany in addition export energiewende to other eu country this mean that together with he germany will redistribute and resell the gas purchase from russia to other in this puzzle it will become key country in the future both for the western and eastern part of the old continent the kremlin will not be able to cut off the supply of blue fuel due to the risk of huge financial loss other give up gas because then they will risk the stability of their own energy system until recently obstacle pile up on the road to mutually beneficial energy cooperation between berlin and moscow of which the objection of poland and ukraine be among the small the full security of the energiewende require the construction of the nord stream gas pipeline without it berlin have to take great care of ukraine's stability and support its government enter into conflict with russia whether it want it or not donald trump skilfully use this block the very completion of the construction of ns2 in order to force germany to submit to many economic issue the problem of berlin be solve by voter in the us because the new administration change washington's strategy it be rational by all mean since china be such powerful and what be bad still grow enemy the front should be keep as short as possible this mean cease to disperse force around the world extinguish conflict with potential ally and throw most of its potential into the region of east asia in the main direction of action nord stream and the benefit of the three power in this puzzle complete ns2 give benefit to the three power at once president biden lift the blockade from the construction of ns2 gain renew cordial friendship with west germany chancellor merkel may begin to extinguish the real field of conflict with russia and stop worry about the continuity of gas supply president putin be finally give more room for maneuver over ukraine on the other hand kyiv in the agreement conclude by washington and berlin be assure that if russia try to use energy as weapon or commit further act of aggression against ukraine germany will take action at the national level and will press for effective measure at the european level include sanction to limit russia's ability to import in the energy sector well 25 year ago the budapest it be not know whether ukraine have any real chance of join the european union many expert point out that due to the interest of among other germany and france this will never happen despite this kyiv turn out to be ready to destroy positions of the christian order in order to maintain its eu perspective if this continue our eastern neighbor may soon turn the country into real feeding ground for the world revolution poland should make every effort to prevent this from happen in 2011 ukraine sign the istanbul convention document that in theory be suppose to protect people at risk of domestic violence but which in fact be revolutionary buzzword that introduce lgbt rhetoric into the legal order despite sign the convention the ukrainian do not decide to ratify the document for many year without it it could not come into force the outbreak of the war change everything in this regard accord to unofficial information provide by the ukrainian medium without the ratification of the convention ukraine would not be able to obtain the status of candidate to the european union it be probably in the hope of obtain this status that president volodymyr is last week submit draft ratification of the convention to the verkhovna rada on monday the verkhovna rada ratify it 259 deputy of the ukrainian parliament vote for and only eight vote against this show that the adoption of the istanbul convention be indeed see as sine qua non condition for obtain the promise of grant ukraine candidate status to the european union will not decide here whether ukrainian politician really believe that their country will one day be admit to the eu or whether they just want to seduce voter with such prospect also leave aside the belief clearly behind the desire to join the eu that it have some power to deter russia and thus increase the chance of survival of ukrainian statehood the decision of ukrainian motivate by fear may be irrational however it be clear that some force intend to use the ongoing war to push ukraine in the direction of an anti christian revolution perhaps brussel itself instruct kiev to ratify the convention it be also possible that the government in kiev which be after all associate with liberal from the united states decide to return the chaos of war to carry out this change without provoke much public resistance the revolutionary force operate in the ukrainian issue not only through lead politician but also through various organization nominally grassroot but in fact simply the street arm of great social engineer an example be an event that be plan in warsaw on june 25 homosexual parade bring together both pole and ukrainian be to pass through the street of the polish capital the thing be call warsaw kiyv pride marching for peace this gay pride parade take place in poland because as the organizer explain due to the war it can not be hold in kiev in the traditional format that be why the rainbow circle intend to march in warsaw for peace which they understand as freedom of sexual expression in the spirit of lgbt ideology the revolution however encounter resistance he be almost absent from the ukrainian parliament where the istanbul convention be adopt by an overwhelming majority however not everyone like the homosexual polish ukrainian parade in warsaw for example the ukrainian movement everyone together protest against her organization which fight against the promotion of murder unborn child and the lgbt ideology the movement issue an appeal to president andrzej duda ask he to stop the parade as indicate poland do not host war refugee from ukraine so that some of they would now act together with the polish revolutionary activist for the overthrow of the constitutional order in force in the republic of poland and after all this be exactly what promote the lgbt ideology aim at the family be which be the absolute foundation of the national existence and thus also the foundation of the state's existence in its appeal the all together movement also point out that the lgbt ideology have in fact common intellectual and spiritual root with russian communism today this be rarely remember but it be the most honest truth the lgbt community be only one element of the entire offensive of the ideologue of new marxism just as the old marxism use worker to destroy christian civilization its contemporary version reach for the so call sexual minority and other group but aim at the same thing fundamental reconstruction of the world so that society would be rule by an atheistic totalitarian regime both the adoption of the istanbul convention and the warsaw polish ukrainian homosexual parade be just two example of how the globalist revolution be try to remodel ukraine we have write about the plan of the creator of the new world order towards ukrainey already in pch24. pl many time even before the war ukraine be perceive by many as an excellent field for social engineering experiment as evidence by for example the extremely widespread in this country child trafficking carry out among other for the need of homosexual deviant from all over the west after the war when it become necessary to rebuild ukraine the world revolution will not allow the country to rise from ruin base on its christian history and identity the left will do everything to make the new ukraine state that implement its plan down to the small detail engage in help ukrainian and possibly support its reconstruction after the war poland must pay attention to this and carry out its century old mission of bring catholic christianity to eastern europe in connection with the current government's tightening of cooperation with brussels may we never stand on the other side become for ukraine no long apostle of christ but emissary of the anti christian revolutionpoland must save ukraine from the fate of the revolution's feeding ground opinia

day by day be series in which we show you the most important event during the pass week there will be bit about tax change or sugar tax and we admit this be not an objective statement 1st of january we like to shoot ourselves love the smell of napalm in the morning say william bill kilgore one of the hero of the famous apocalypse now the lieutenant colonel would also feel good on new year's eve and the next few day in poland where the smell of burn firework linger in the air for long time after the annual firework display pandemic be not pandemic many pole apart from animal owner love the new year's eve cannonade this can also be see in eu statistic accord to they in 2019 11, 000 tonne of firework be import to poland from outside the eu the leader be germany which import as much as 38, 000 ton the weekend of january it be not good the ministry under finance have publish on its website information on tax change in 2021 as we know apart from few favorable one several new solution have come into force this year which to put it mildly be not business friendly the ministry's communication department be do everything not to call spade spade when write about the cit taxation of limited partnership he use the expression tighten provision and while inform about the introduction of the trade tax he argue that this tax be not new at all because it be introduce few year ago but its entry into force be only postpone by the way point it be just that this verbal acrobatic the aim of which be to avoid the expression new taxis at all cost be bit like the dilemma of certain manager of cultural center from the time of the people's republic of poland he be suppose to organize concert of punk band unfortunately in accordance with the then punk style the band have vulgar name prze the clever manager however get out of this awkward situation and write on the poster that the band not good will play monday january not only sugar be bad for health do not see anything wrong in it sugar be unhealthy so it should be subject to high tax say prime minister mateusz morawiecki when ask about the tax on certain sugar contain product introduce in january as we know it will soar price of sweetened beverage some producer be already try to reduce the volume of bottle so that consumer be not so much offend by high price on store shelf commentator emphasize that the polish sugar tax be exceptionally high the third high in europe after great britain and ireland and that it have not contribute to reduce the problem of for example obesity in other country follow this lead one should expect taxation of chip luncheon meat bread coffee margarine and many other product that be describe in popular health guide as have an adverse effect on the body these idea come up few year ago the prime minister can only be remind that accord to some stress be the most unfavorable to health and it can be cause by rise taxis and price in store but how to tax it tuesday january in the official journal of the eu what you have to do today do yesterday procrastination be the result of competition between the limbic system and the prefrontal cortex this be how the well know feature of many people be put off often until the last minute in scientific way some try to make fun of she by say what you have to do today do the day after tomorrow you will have two day off but it be not always fun this feature be particularly troublesome in the case of submit bid in public tender many contractor do it even few minute before the schedule date which be cause of great stress this time it be not the late bidder but the procuring entity that have fall into the trap of procrastination all because of the change in the public procurement law introduce in the new year accord to dziennik gazeta prawna almost 300 large proceeding may be conduct unlawfully why the contracting authority among whom there be probably many office who want to make it before the entry into force of the new regulation and carry out order accord to the exist rule in some case announce the procedure on 31 december they rub their hand and go to new year's eve the problem be as the daily report that in the case of order above the so call eu threshold it be not the date of send the notice to the official journal of the eu that be decisive but the date of its publication and this may take place few day later that be how it be this time as result order submit at the end of the new year be publish in january and should theoretically be implement accord to the new regulation this be good lesson for those who think they can outsmart the system wednesday january well less than more the polish agency for enterprise development boast about the activity of its helpline last year in 202over the last year over 100, 000 consultation have be carry out through it telephone mail chat what be the consultation most often about it be not entirely know accord to parp information the hotline be contact by among other entrepreneur who be look for way to finance their idea this be the bright side of the coin it be know however that large part of call to paed be request for explanation of complicated mechanism settlement of grant under eu program we appreciate the effort and commitment of consultant service hotline of state institution such as parp zus or the national revenue administration they have really thankless job but we would be more careful about boast about the huge number of consultation we provide yes lot of valuable information be provide via the hotline but its intensive work and often overload also result or perhaps primarily from unclear regulation that need to be explain to hundred of thousand of entrepreneur thursday january computer for everything it be true that this information appear in the industry medium at the end of the year but it be still present in the economic medium at the beginning of january so we note it because it show an important new trend in computer design well know fast food company together with manufacturer of pc case have create computer in the shape of chicken bucket the bucket computer be equip with heating function this allow you to enjoy hot meal without have to go to the kitchen the idea have little to do with promote healthy and active lifestyle but many player and lover of american chicken will be delighted plus of the week the ministry of entrepreneurship development and technology announce the commencement of work on the new industrial policy of poland its purpose be among other development of domestic industry and increase its innovativeness as well as increase the economy's resistance to shock such as global pandemic the idea be good and the information so far indicate that the new policy will take into account many of the demand of the polish chamber of commerce submit at the beginning of the pandemic and concern among other independence from supplier from asia or strong inclusion of polish company in global supply chain minus of the week advertisement reportedly appear as report by the poznan base gazeta wyborcza offer negative result of coronavirus test in addition they be cheap than real test this be service of the same genre as the previously publish advertisement of infect people who for fee be ready to report any person to the health department with whom they have contact so they arrange quarantine and dismissal we have reputation as an entrepreneurial nation but there be limitday after day economic weekly with grain of salt

among the many banner present at anti pis protest one in particular catch the eye with concise slogan get the fuck out however this issue be more complicated than it may seem and require clarification fuck off but who kaczynski himself the whole pis with or without youth and solidarna polska gowin's sofa and the confederation can stay another perhaps even more difficult issue be where to get the fuck it mass emigration especially in the era of covidu seem difficult to meet accord to party datum pis currently have over 40, 000 member this number increase by half during the previous term alone so where to send these people and who would want they it be easy to shout get the fuck out but what then no one think about it anymore in order to check whether this beautiful political slogan translate into practice decide to analyze the export of only one person from poland the president of pis he enjoy such authority on the right that if he leave alone the rest will inevitably follow he russia have read all the biography of the deputy prime minister available on the market and sad picture emerge from they jarosław go abroad only once as an 18 year old on the black sea in the soviet union unfortunately even with short trip he be not satisfied in the interview river about two such alphabet of the kaczynski brothers kaczynski recall the hot summer holiday supply at catastrophic level few year early they eat bread with sawdust after return to poland we have the impression that we be return to the zone of freedom and wealth some time have pass since the collapse of the soviet union and russia have become prized retirement home for fall warlord for example viktor yanukovych the ukrainian ex president be retire there sentence in absentia to 13 year in prison in his country unfortunately relation between putin and kaczynski be not the good when jarosław be prime minister in 2006 2007 the gentleman never meet in 2010 as we know putin murder kaczynski's brother who be go to russia on guest visit this be not the good land for cohabitation although it be worth add that on the upper volga there be already the city of jarosław with over 600, 000 inhabitant name after another wise jarosław prince yaroslav the wise kaczynski's nature be also such that he would immediately start to work with putin and although it be great country one dictator have be enough for he for year even if kaczynski manage to provoke another revolution in russia which be already favorable to poland in regain independence it do not seem realistic that this man mentally close to the bolshevik would be able to get on horse and reach the border another no less important barrier be language the president be not panimajet be you gavarish if we add to this the fact that the pis elite might feel some historically justified anxiety before travel deep into this heavily forest country it become clear that jarosław may not go to russia to emigrate but at most for tea england the most popular emigration destination among pole it would suit kaczynski if only in this respect that he could try to create another government in exile in history and through it issue decree award order and pretend to exercise real power the president however have be to the thame before and to put it mildly do not like it in november 1989 the authority of the civic parliamentary club order he to go to london to mobilize english politician and the local polish community in the matter of recognize the polish german border in the book agreement against monopoly the president recall have problem with passport control at the airport despite my diplomatic passport be ask what want to do and where to live struggle to answer something return to poland with some relief year later kaczynski make another flight to england this time however he do not even leave the airport he immediately go to warsaw on the return plane with ryszard kaczorowski who decide to return the insignia of the head of state of the second polish republic it take 20 year for the next visit to the queen's country in june 2010 as pis's presidential candidate kaczynski pay visit to prime minister david cameron the camera capture the british man's polite greeting and kaczynski's reaction the word aj do not anderstend combine with panicky wave of hand and search for an interpreter on march 22 2017 kaczynski go to london for the last time to meet prime minister theresa may and discuss brexit however the terrorist attack on westminster bridge force he to stay overnight in london it be not you will admit memory you want to come back to among the advantage of stay in england kaczynski could undoubtedly mention the fact that this country have cease to belong to the european union which impose its opinion on poland as regard the rule of law and human right in addition kaczynski whoamong other fail in high school from class to class with in english he could come across numerous pole in the uk and open his mouth in the only language he know however there be risk that among the compatriot there could be people unfavorable to the president for example pro abortion activist who protest in large number last week in front of the embassy in london and he would at least end up bruisefuck out but where

suppose to appear in the world in the 17th century during the reign of tsar peter he want the officer of the fleet to drink wine in the western way from glass and not from wooden vessel like some wilderness at that time glass be not as common and cheap material as it be today so it be necessary to think about how to avoid loss one that it be expensive and two that broken glass be risk of injury same problem but the drive to western civilization be strong the specific shape of the glass be to facilitate sip on board the ship because when it fall it do not roll on table and the floor like its round counterpart it also lay well in the hand when the boat be toss by the wave and the company do not necessarily maintain full psychomotor efficiency historical anecdote claim that the woman monumental sculpture depict couple of soviet people with hammer and sickle in their hand symbol of the mosfilm film studio the artist design the glass be supposedly inspire in addition to the spirit of practicality by ancient greek column the painter kazimierz malewicz the author of the famous black square on white background be also suppose to participate in the creation process in fact for vodka it be well to design glass than to slide on siberian glassputin be look for two

the old town of lubbenau be locate about 90 kilometer south of berlin and 75 kilometer from the polish border its recent history be by no mean success story and the town seem to accept that its good year be behind it however he do it in an interesting and impressive way include the help of penguin the town have nearly 16, 000 inhabitant inhabitant and belong geographically to the spreewald region this name refer to the river spree which along with extensive canal flow close to this town once in the gdr year its energy industry and large housing estate in the center near the station mean that in 1981 the number of inhabitant reach 22, 000 after the collapse of the socialist state and the closure of most plant the number of inhabitant steadily decrease and in 2021 it amount to only 15, 200 people the large coal power plant in the world lubbenau have great history of coal fire energy in 1959 the large coal fire power plant in the world be build here it have capacity of 1. 3 gw and employ 5, 000 people in the 1990 after the systemic breakthrough it be decide to close the power plant which be consider unprofitable under capitalist condition currently the energy supply in lubbenau be the responsibility of stadt und uberlandwerke gmbh luckau lubbenau sull whose main shareholder be the city of lubbenau and the nearby municipality energy be mainly produce in gas block the lubbenau chp plant currently have two peak load boiler 20. 5 mw each and cogeneration module 1. 2 and 0. 8 mwel the plant be supply with natural gas of group from its respective high pressure network sull have medium voltage transmission network through which electricity be distribute and its own district heating network the area between the railway station and the residential area to the north of it be now the so call energy field which be create in cooperation between the city of lubbenau the swiss company repower and the company sull it be place accessible to everyone where you can see the innovative wind turbine windpillar with wind above 10 meter per second the turbine be capable of produce 17, 250 kwh per year the german branch of repower have be the operator of the nearby kittlitz wind park since 2010 which be build on the site of the former opencast mine of the same name penguin pool lubbenau attract tourist with an incredible offer it be great pool complete with 31 penguin guest can watch bird through thick glass window or take part in educational activity that end with petting and feed the penguin even before the outbreak of the pandemic the penguin pool be visit by over million visitor originally in 2007 spreewaldwelten gmbh take over two municipal swimming pool which after many renovation turn into today's water resort spreewaldwelten gmbh be own by the city of lubbennau and the local housing association explain ms sabine who conduct educational class with penguin the housing cooperative which own over 4, 100 apartment in lubbenau and altdobern confirm in an interview with biznesalert wis that it be shareholder of spreewalswelten gmbh in the balance sheet report from 2019 spreewaldwelten be list as particularly profitable company of this company which due to the high number of guest and the completion of the construction of the hotel which be part of the complex with swimming pool positively surprise the parent company by generate profit the profitability of the swimming pool and related restaurant and hotel be also confirm in an interview with biznesalert. pl by the person conduct the educational class spreewaldwelten be still profitable and self finance despite the fact that swimming pool water heating be extremely energy intensive in the case of penguin farming there be also the cost of cool food for these animal frozen fish be store in large refrigerator neither the spreewaldwelten gmbh nor the wis housing association nor the local energy supplier sull respond to the editor's question about the high energy cost in germany many swimming pool face with high gas price and the possible shortage of this raw material decide to lower the water temperature for example in stuttgart the water temperature be already 26 degree not 28 degree and in detmold it be even 24 degree the situation be different in munich where swimming pool rely on geothermal energy you can still bask in the heat therethere be energy there be penguin

ukrainian nationalist who flee to the far east in the 1930 not only launch anti soviet activity there but also incite hatred for poland this follow from the document declassify by the fsb in primorye which ria novosti have review among the material be photocopy of protocol of interrogation of activist of the ukrainian national colony unk in the autumn of 1945 in the soviet military counterintelligence smersh unk be create in 1934 on the initiative of ukrainian nationalist who emigrate to manchuria its main task be to actively fight against the ussr in order to seize primorye from the soviet union in order to form ukrainian nationalist state on this territory for these purpose the unc create radical youth anti soviet nationalist organization ukrainian far eastern sich the far eastern sich be an extremely nationalist organization and focus on the germans be kind of fascist organization hate everything polish and carry out its political activity in this direction yury roy former chairman of the board of the unc in 1936 1939 say during interrogation ukrainian far eastern sich actually become branch of the organization of ukrainian nationalist which be support by the nazi military intelligence abwehr at the end of the polish soviet war accord to poland riga peace treaty of 1921 western ukrainian land be cede to poland warsaw actually establish an occupation regime there the brutal polonization of these territory begin right up to the placement of ukrainian in concentration camp in the summer of 1924 the polish authority officially ban the use of the ukrainian language in public institution dissatisfied ukrainian either emigrate abroad or join the rank of ultra right association in particular the ukrainian military organization form in 1920 and the oun create on its basis in 1929 the restriction of the right of the ukrainian minority contribute to the radicalization of part of the population of galicia and volyn spin the flywheel of interethnic violence subsequently during the second world war this lead to the genocide of the polish inhabitant of western ukraine by ukrainian nationalist the culmination of the event of 1943 which be call the volyn massacre be consider july 11 on this day ukrainian nationalists attack about 150 polish village at the same time polish historian regard the volhynia massacre as genocide and ethnic cleansing and claim the death accord to various source from 100, 000 to 130, 000 the nationalists incite hatred for poland for the 1930

the lpo league for the protection of bird have just appoint new general manager matthieu orphelin former mp for maine et loire former eelv activist and fierce defender of wind turbine an astonishing choice when we know the damage that their huge pads do to bird and bat the opportunity for bertrand alliot spokesperson for action ecologie to explain why any association for the protection of self respect nature should be without compromise fiercely oppose to wind turbine any installation of infrastructure have an impact on the environment and particularly on landscape and biodiversity under penalty of go back to the kerosene lamp we must accept certain degradation of our environment what be funny today be that the degradation of natural environment be necessary to implement ecological policy to produce renewable electricity it be necessary for example to build electric dam and flood entire valley to develop the transport of good on boat and thus reduce greenhouse gas emission it be necessary to build canal and often transform portion of wild river into lifeless gutter this be how in the name of ecology protest group be form to fight project carry out in the name of ecology some then point out ironically that to be at peace with ecology it be good to do nothing at all fortunately many nature protection association be more conciliatory because they be aware that the infrastructure provide excellent service to society they know for example that power line kill thousand of bird each year but they do not ask for their dismantle nor do they call for the large scale burying of line because they know that the cost would be unbearable for society be aware of the economic stake they be rather look for compromise the installation of anti collision system for example which for reasonable cost can reduce the impact it be undoubtedly in this spirit that they be not headwind against the wind turbine which nevertheless do significant damage to the fauna every year thousand of bird and bat be kill by the huge blade of wind turbine but be not these in addition to produce electricity use by everyone also solution in the fight against climate change regard wind turbine the association be all the more open to compromise because in addition to the economic issue that they have learn to integrate they detect an ecological issue against which they do not see themselves rise by react in this way the association be make very poor analysis wind energy be one of the renewable energy on which european country have bet to decarbonize their economy and more particularly their electricity production in france the latter be essentially of nuclear and hydraulic origin it emit very little carbon dioxide and this be one of the reason which make france one of the good sectors at the international level increase the number of wind turbine will not change french performance will wind turbine be able to replace nuclear power plant which present certain danger in fact very measured or the remain gas or coal power plant nay wind turbine like solar panel be source of intermittent energy they produce electricity when the wind blow wind infrastructure must therefore be back up by controllable infrastructure nuclear coal gas etc which will take over during windless period bird and bat killer do not replace exist infrastructure they be add this be perfectly verifiable with our german neighbor who have develop wind and solar power in spectacular way without lower its controllable production capacity we see that the ecological cost be very high in term of infrastructure therefore in term of the use of raw material and energy this cost be far increase when consider the lifespan of wind turbine 20 year which be much short than that of controllable power plant 60 to 80 year the association would like this long list of disadvantage to stop but it be not the development of wind power require the installation of new infrastructure to connect to the exist network all the new production area which by force of circumstance be scatter all over the territory essential infrastructure when the wind be not blow but also when it blow too much when wind power generation increase theepoch of energy surplus be multiply and push the public authority to build more to allow or facilitate the storage of energy here too the example of germany be eloquent it be set up for an exorbitant price hydrogen sector entirely base on the recovery of surplus renewable electricity to this significant ecological cost we must add the economic cost accord to the court of auditor the french public authority have already spend the staggering sum of 121 billion euro and be prepare to return to the pot to build wind farm in the open ocean the extraordinary seabird virtuoso of the air fear neither the wind nor the wave nor the spray will they be able to avoid the blade of wind turbine nature protection association should be question on this subject and in continuity because the answer be beyond doubt ask they to reconsider their position the league for the protection of bird lpo say it be unfavourable to the development of renewable energy generate significant negative impact for biodiversity but authorize judgment on case by case basis it specify that it be unfavourable to wind project in spa and zsc bat as well as in the living space and movement route of heritage specie the language be cryptic and technocratic where we expect clarity and intransigence we only see vagueness and the option of small arrangement emerge when circumstance so require association should no long play the role of ngo that be both demanding and measure quality that be so useful for maneuver in the sphere of power they must become stupid and wicked again put away the chastise language to bring out the swear word bazooka and big bertha be the two udder of the fight the development of wind power be one of the most absurd policy pursue by france today it do not respond to economic or ecological issue let chaffinch or pipistrelle perish fine but not in the name of the absurdnature protection association can not be favorable to wind turbine

the american president do not mince his word face the russian leader joe biden travel to warsaw poland on saturday march 26 to deliver speech and meet with ukrainian refugee during his trip he call vladimir putin butcher and dictator he did not stop at these two word and take the opportunity to affirm that the russian president should not stay in power he also state that russia will never win in ukraine we will have bright future base on democracy hope and light probity and freedom the american president can afford to use martial tone because he know that his country be in no danger the united states be sovereign in every way economic political and military joe biden with his shocking statement put himself back at the center of the russian ukrainian conflict but now the risky word of the american president have consequence in europe the continent on which the armed conflict be take place they disrupt the strategy of european who maintain dialogue with vladimir putin at all cost as anthony bellanger point out on bfm tv the europeans have vladimir poutine as neighbour which imply that we have no choice but to dialogue at the risk of accentuate tension between western country and russia because unlike the country of uncle sam europe be not self sufficient in energy it must take for account its dependence on russian gas will shake by the 46th president of the united states however this be not the first time that the term use by joe biden have cause reaction since the invasion of ukraine two week ago the head of the first world power call his counterpart war criminal on the russian side the kremlin call the attack on vladimir putin personal insult and ask joe biden to remain thoughtful moscow inform the press that the russian authority would continue to follow very attentively the letter of the american presidentfor joe biden vladimir putin be butcher and dictator

the american president do not mince his word face the russian leader joe biden travel to warsaw poland on saturday march 26 to deliver speech and meet with ukrainian refugee during his trip he call vladimir putin butcher and dictator he do not stop at the two word and take the opportunity to affirm that the russian president should not stay in power he also state that russia will never win in ukraine we will have bright future base on democracy hope and light probity and freedom the american president can afford to use martial tone because he know that his country be in no danger the united states be sovereign in every way economic political and military joe biden with his shocking statement put himself back at the center of the russian ukrainian conflict but now the risky word of the american president have consequence in europe the continent on which the armed conflict be take place they disrupt the strategy of european who maintain dialogue with vladimir putin at all cost as anthony bellanger point out on bfm tv the europeans have vladimir poutine as neighbour which imply that we have no choice but to dialogue at the risk of accentuate tension between western country and russia because unlike the country of uncle sam europe be not self sufficient in energy it must take into account its dependence on russian gas will shake by the 46th president of the united states however this be not the first time that the term use by joe biden have cause reaction since the invasion of ukraine two week ago the head of the first world power call his counterpart war criminal on the russian side the kremlin call the attack on vladimir putin personal insult and ask joe biden to remain to moscow inform the press otherwise the russian authority would continue to follow very attentively the word of the american presidentfor joe biden vladimir putin be butcher and dictator

cop 26 do not end in glasgow as plan its president the briton alok sharma have insist that it be necessary to put coal in the history book specify we must stop use coal and also stop all subsidy to fossil fuel everything seem settle for an uneventful vote when on saturday november 13 an hour before the closing of the conference an unprecedented event occur the representative of india its minister for the environment bhupender yadav declare that his country do not accept the propose wording and propose another wording as follow we must move towards clean technology include by intensify effort to phase out coal power and phase out inefficient fossil fuel subsidy the indian minister then argue that china support india's suggestion official projection from these country show that global co2 emission will inexorably continue to grow should we then fear catastrophe no there be time more co in the atmosphere at the time of the dinosaur and everything be fine if we be afraid it be because we be afraid because fear distort judgment and the proponent of our view of humanity might have dominate the un for half century know this well however this should only be science november 2018 as sudden as it be unprecedented the revolt of the yellow vest shake france the reason for the anger the constant rise in fuel price in the name of the fight against excessive co emission and hypothetical ecological transition the government of emmanuel macron follow the recommendation of the united nations and the referendum persist in make carbon dioxide the cause of global warming that can justify any tax tighten christian gerondeau's book show however that our national emission weigh nothing compare to the mass of co present in the atmosphere and if all develop country be to completely eliminate their emission by the middle of the century the impact on the concentration of co in the atmosphere would not exceed to the yellow vest be therefore right the ecological transition can only be pretext as its foundation do not stand up to scrutiny can we therefore consider the grow need of humanity in oil gas and coal as disaster for the climate the late satellite reading do not point in this direction sure in 2015 and early 2016 rise in temperature set record but it do not last long the official record reproduce in this book be unanimous thing return to normal in the middle of 2016 moreover many lead scientist in france and elsewhere go so far as to affirm that there be no only no reason to fear co emission but on the contrary that we must rejoice it be therefore time to dare to ask the taboo question co disaster or benefitclimate the great global manipulation the twelve lie of the ipcc and the ecological religion

eliminate their emission by the middle of the century the impact on the concentration of co in the atmosphere would not exceed to the yellow vest be therefore right the ecological transition can only
